subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Mets had overcome a bad starting pitching performance by Oliver Perez to take a lead in the seventh inning, but the Giants won on a two-run home run by Aaron Rowand.
snippet: The Mets had overcome a bad starting pitching performance by Oliver Perez to take a lead in the seventh inning, but the Giants won on a two-run home run by Aaron Rowand.
